name: A light in the Dark (itch) (Pascal Fitzner, Tankred Ott, Milatur)
name_original: A light in the Dark (itch) (Pascal Fitzner, Tankred Ott, Milatur)
description:
Description:

Control a hero only equipped with a flashlight to flee out of a haunted castle. This game was developed for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1. The time window of this jam was one week, but due to our working hours, our actual development time frame was  48h.

How to play?
  • Search for the golden keys in the castle.
  • Find the exit after you acquired the key
  • Do not get caught by the furniture that has come to life
Controls:

Movement - arrow keys/WASD

Flashlight direction - Mouse

Flashlight ON/OFF - Space

Pause Menu - P

Contributor:

Pascal Fitzner

Martin Stimpfl

Tankred Ott
